company_name: Ma'aden Gold and Base Metals Company (MGBM)
policy_holder: MA'ADEN Gold and Base Metals Company (MGBM)

coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit. Follows the Standard pre-authorization protocol.

coverage_details.organ_transplant: Covered within KSA (heart and liver only; excludes organ cost); see special instructions
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit. Follows the Standard pre-authorization protocol. No pre-approval required for VIP+ services except for outpatient dental, kidney assistance for pregnancy and optical, and audiology when needed.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Organ transplant benefit (heart/liver; in KSA) excludes the organ cost. Executive checkup package for CEO & 15 VPs annually (subject to PA by RM/Elite, by approval); new hire medical checkups; renal dialysis up to SR 500,000 for 5 cases; special vaccinations (Rotavirus, Meningitis, Influenza annual); home care for handicapped/geriatrics; annual cancer/prostate screening for applicable adults; medical devices, equipment, and prostheses covered if prescribed; diabetes devices and supplies, knee replacement (as needed, incl. organ cost, in & out KSA); nil deductible for dental/services; ear piercing for newborn girls; dedicated Medical Care Unit doctor; Freestyle Libre & sensors for diabetes; reimbursement as per Dr. Sulaiman Al Habib Hospital benchmark pricing.

coverage_details.organ_transplant: Covered within KSA (heart and liver only; excludes organ cost); see special instructions
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit. Follows the Standard pre-authorization protocol. No pre-approval required except outpatient dental, kidney assistance for pregnancy and optical, audiology as specified.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Organ transplant benefit (heart/liver; in KSA) excludes the organ cost. Executive checkup package for CEO & 15 VPs annually (subject to PA by RM/Elite, by approval); new hire medical checkups; renal dialysis up to SR 500,000 for 5 cases; special vaccinations (Rotavirus, Meningitis, Influenza annual); home care for handicapped/geriatrics; annual cancer/prostate screening for applicable adults; medical devices, equipment, and prostheses covered if prescribed; diabetes devices and supplies, knee replacement (as needed, incl. organ cost, in & out KSA); nil deductible for dental/services; ear piercing for newborn girls; dedicated Medical Care Unit doctor; Freestyle Libre & sensors for diabetes; reimbursement as per Dr. Sulaiman Al Habib Hospital benchmark pricing.
